alert.note: Alert for Marion (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 7:35PM CDT until June 24 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Adams County in west central Illinois... Northeastern Marion County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 735 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maywood, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quincy, Palmyra, Quincy Regional Airport, Payson, Adams, Burton, Taylor, Marblehead, Paloma, and Fowler. This includes Interstate 172 between exits 10 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
